Typealiases.html#/s:6DadKit7Loadouta.name: Loadout
Typealiases.html#/s:6DadKit7Loadouta.abstract: Alias for an array that contains Items which can be subscripted with an Item.Slot or Item.Tier.

Structs/Player.html#/s:6DadKit6PlayerV11.name: displayName
Structs/Player.html#/s:6DadKit6PlayerV11.abstract: The player’s chosen name on their platform.

Structs/Player.html#/s:6DadKit6PlayerV8p.name: platform
Structs/Player.html#/s:6DadKit6PlayerV8p.abstract: The platform on which this player account originates.

Structs/Member.html#/s:6DadKit6MemberV8i.name: isOnline
Structs/Member.html#/s:6DadKit6MemberV8i.abstract: A flag to indicate whether this clan member is currently online.

Structs/Member.html#/s:6DadKit6MemberV15.name: destinyUserInfo
Structs/Member.html#/s:6DadKit6MemberV15.abstract: The Destiny player information for this clan member.

Structs/Item/Slot.html#/s:6DadKit4ItemV4.name: other
Structs/Item/Slot.html#/s:6DadKit4ItemV4.abstract: Consumables, cosmetics, and other items we’re currently ignoring.

Structs/Item/Tier.html#/s:6DadKit4ItemV4.name: basic0
Structs/Item/Tier.html#/s:6DadKit4ItemV4.abstract: One of these represents uncommon. Regardless, we don’t really care.

Structs/Item.html#/s:6DadKit4ItemV4icon1.name: icon
Structs/Item.html#/s:6DadKit4ItemV4icon1.abstract: The URL where the icon for this item may be retreived.

Structs/Item.html#/s:6DadKit4ItemV10dama.name: damageType
Structs/Item.html#/s:6DadKit4ItemV10dama.abstract: The damage type of this item, e.g. Kinectic, Solar, etc.

Structs/Item.html#/s:6DadKit4ItemV4tierA.name: tier
Structs/Item.html#/s:6DadKit4ItemV4tierA.abstract: The rarity tier of this item, e.g. Legendary.

Structs/Item.html#/s:6DadKit4ItemV19isFu.name: isFullyMasterworked
Structs/Item.html#/s:6DadKit4ItemV19isFu.abstract: A flag that inidicates whether this item is fully masterworked and should be displayed accordingly.

Structs/Item/DamageType.html.name: DamageType
Structs/Item/DamageType.html.abstract: A type representing the various types of damage that a weapon can deal.

Structs/Item/Tier.html.name: Tier
Structs/Item/Tier.html.abstract: A type representing the levels of rarity associated with items.

Structs/Item/Slot.html.name: Slot
Structs/Item/Slot.html.abstract: A type representing the inventory slots in which items may reside.

Structs/Clan.html#/s:6DadKit4ClanV7group.name: groupId
Structs/Clan.html#/s:6DadKit4ClanV7group.abstract: The unique identifier for this clan on Bungie.net.

Structs/Character/Subclass/Tree.html#/s:.name: top
Structs/Character/Subclass/Tree.html#/s:.abstract: The location of the tree in the Subclass screen in-game.

Structs/Character/Subclass/Tree.html#/s:.name: unknown
Structs/Character/Subclass/Tree.html#/s:.abstract: Safety case for if/when new subclass trees are created.

Structs/Character/Subclass/Tree.html#/s:.name: path(for:)
Structs/Character/Subclass/Tree.html#/s:.abstract: The name of the Tree’s path for a given a Subclass.

Structs/Character/Subclass/Tree.html#/s:.name: super(for:)
Structs/Character/Subclass/Tree.html#/s:.abstract: The name of the super associated with the Tree for a given a Subclass.

Structs/Character/Subclass.html#/s:6DadK.name: solar(_:)
Structs/Character/Subclass.html#/s:6DadK.abstract: A given character’s class and subclass combination.

Structs/Character/Subclass.html#/s:6DadK.name: unknown
Structs/Character/Subclass.html#/s:6DadK.abstract: Safety case for if/when new subclass combos are created.

Structs/Character/Subclass/Tree.html.name: Tree
Structs/Character/Subclass/Tree.html.abstract: A type representing a Character’s Subclass tree.

Structs/Character.html#/s:6DadKit9Charac.name: classType
Structs/Character.html#/s:6DadKit9Charac.abstract: This character’s class, i.e. Titan, Hunter, or Warlock.

Structs/Character.html#/s:6DadKit9Charac.name: subclass
Structs/Character.html#/s:6DadKit9Charac.abstract: This character’s subclass, i.e. Solar, Arc, or Void.

Structs/Character.html#/s:6DadKit9Charac.name: level
Structs/Character.html#/s:6DadKit9Charac.abstract: The current experience progression level of this character.

Structs/Character.html#/s:6DadKit9Charac.name: light
Structs/Character.html#/s:6DadKit9Charac.abstract: The current power level of this character based on equipped gear.

Structs/Character.html#/s:6DadKit9Charac.name: mobility
Structs/Character.html#/s:6DadKit9Charac.abstract: The current mobility stat of this character.

Structs/Character.html#/s:6DadKit9Charac.name: resilience
Structs/Character.html#/s:6DadKit9Charac.abstract: The current resilience stat of this character.

Structs/Character.html#/s:6DadKit9Charac.name: recovery
Structs/Character.html#/s:6DadKit9Charac.abstract: The current recovery stat of this character.

Structs/Character.html#/s:6DadKit9Charac.name: emblemPath
Structs/Character.html#/s:6DadKit9Charac.abstract: The url for the character’s current emblem.

Structs/Character.html#/s:6DadKit9Charac.name: emblemBackgroundPath
Structs/Character.html#/s:6DadKit9Charac.abstract: The url for the character’s current emblem for background display.

Structs/Character.html#/s:6DadKit9Charac.name: loadout
Structs/Character.html#/s:6DadKit9Charac.abstract: The relevant items equipped on the character. Subscriptable with Item.Slot and Item.Tier.

Structs/Character.html.name: Character
Structs/Character.html.abstract: A type for represeting an in-game character for Destiny 2.

Structs/Clan.html.name: Clan
Structs/Clan.html.abstract: A type representing a clan on Bungie.net.

Structs/Member.html.name: Member
Structs/Member.html.abstract: A type for representing a player who is a member of a clan. Returned from API requests for clan members.

Structs/Player.html.name: Player
Structs/Player.html.abstract: A type for representing a player of Destiny 2.

Enums/Bungie.html#/s:6DadKit6BungieO10ap.name: appVersion
Enums/Bungie.html#/s:6DadKit6BungieO10ap.abstract: The current version of the RaidDad app target. Used to create the user agent string.

Enums/Bungie/Platform.html.name: Platform
Enums/Bungie/Platform.html.abstract: A type representing the available platforms for Destiny 2.

Enums/Bungie.html#/s:6DadKit6BungieO33ge.name: getCurrentCharacterWithoutLoadout(for:)
Enums/Bungie.html#/s:6DadKit6BungieO33ge.abstract: Retrieves the given player‘s most recently used Character without making the requests for the loadout.

Enums/Bungie.html#/s:6DadKit6BungieO19ge.name: getCurrentCharacter(for:)
Enums/Bungie.html#/s:6DadKit6BungieO19ge.abstract: Retrieves the given player‘s most recently used Character, fully formed, including all loadout data.

Enums/Bungie.html#/s:6DadKit6BungieO7get.name: getClan(with:)
Enums/Bungie.html#/s:6DadKit6BungieO7get.abstract: Gets the specific Clan with the provided identifier.

Enums/Bungie.html#/s:6DadKit6BungieO13se.name: searchForClan(named:)
Enums/Bungie.html#/s:6DadKit6BungieO13se.abstract: Performs a clan search using the provided name.

Enums/Bungie.html#/s:6DadKit6BungieO10ge.name: getLoadout(for:)
Enums/Bungie.html#/s:6DadKit6BungieO10ge.abstract: Retrieves the complete Loadout for a given character. This function is only necessary when using

Enums/Bungie.html#/s:6DadKit6BungieO14ge.name: getClanMembers(in:)
Enums/Bungie.html#/s:6DadKit6BungieO14ge.abstract: Retreives all clan members in the provided clan.

Enums/Bungie.html#/s:6DadKit6BungieO15se.name: searchForPlayer(with:on:)
Enums/Bungie.html#/s:6DadKit6BungieO15se.abstract: Performs a search for the given player tag on the provided platform.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
